results.name: Row 2 of array in A288580.
reference: F. Smarandache, Back and Forth Factorials, Arizona State Univ., Special Collections, 1972.
link: J. Dezert, ed., Smarandacheials (1), Mathematics Magazine for Grades 1-12, No. 4, 2004.
J. Dezert, ed., Smarandacheials (2), Mathematics Magazine for Grades 1-12, No. 4, 2004.
maple: for i from 0 to floor(2*n/k) do
if n-k*i <> 0 then p:=p*(n-k*i) fi; od:
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := Module[{i, p = 1}, For[i = 0, i <= Floor[2n/k], i++, If[n - k i != 0, p *= (n - k i)]]; p]; T[_, 0] = 1;
results.author: J. Dezert (Jean.Dezert(AT)onera.fr), Mar 21 2004
ext: Entry revised by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 03 2017
